example.caption: compute properties of moist air
example.input: What is the dew point at drybulb 30C and 50% at 6000ft?

example.input: absorption coefficient of sound moist air at 30C and 20%

example.caption: analyze heating or cooling of moist air
example.input: adiabatically cool moist air at Tdry=30C to Tdry2=22C
example.caption: analyze humidification of moist air
example.input: humidify moist air at drybulb 15C and 20% to 30C and 55%
example.caption: analyze mixing of moist air streams
example.input: adiabatically mix moist air at drybulb 20C wetbulb 10C with Tdry2=35C Twet2=30C
